title: 2019 Divisional Round Recap
itunes:title: 2019 Divisional Round Recap
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling – react to an exceptional Divisional Round, including – WHO DAT advancing to the NFC Championship? Brees and the Saints overcame a 14-point deficit to edge the Eagles, but will it be NOLA’s defense guiding them to the promised land (3:15)? Sony Michel’s hat trick trashed the Chargers’ Super Bowl aspirations, and is Philip Rivers HOF-worthy (16:00)? The Rams ridiculous rushing performance was enough to send the ‘Boys packing (28:25), and Mahomes waves goodbye to Kansas City’s old playoff ghosts (41:00)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
